LanguageData.Mousekin_Make_DrinkChonkoNutBrew.label: make Chonko nut brew
LanguageData.Mousekin_Make_DrinkChonkoNutBrew.descrip: Make a warm, coffee-like beverage brewed from roasted and ground Chonko nuts, plus a "secret ingredient" for that extra kick. Temporarily improves mood, consciousness and blood circulation.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Make_WortLager.label: make Mousekin lager wort
LanguageData.Mousekin_Make_WortLager.description: Make Mousekin lager wort from Mouse-ear barley and hops.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Make_WortMead.label: make Mousekin mead must
LanguageData.Mousekin_Make_WortMead.description: Make Mousekin mead must from Mousekin honey.
